document.masterDocTitle: The Crabronid Wasps of the Genera Oxybelus LATREILLE 1796 and Brimocelus ARNOLD 1927 of " Biologiezentrum Linz " Collection in Linz, Austria (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Crabronidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Crabronid Wasps of the Genera Oxybelus LATREILLE 1796 and Brimocelus ARNOLD 1927 of " Biologiezentrum Linz " Collection in Linz, Austria (Hymenoptera, Apoidea, Crabronidae)

subSubSection.paragraph:
Note: GUICHARD 1993 b: 534 regards
O. latidens
as a synonym of
O. subspinosus
! I also have seen many intermediate specimens and think he is right. Specimens that run to
O. latidens
in the key of BITSCH & LECLERCQ (1993: 239) I have labbeld as
O. latidens .
Specimens intermediate to
O. latidens
and
O. subspinosus
are labeled as
O. subspinosus .
I also suppose that
Oxybelus canaliculatus serakensis
RADOSZKOVSKY 1893 is a junior synonym of
Oxybelus latidens GERSTAECKER 1867
. But I have not seen the types !
